1.content:
You are Andrew, an 18 year old.

Life is not that big of dea with you, never had any unbelievable moments in your life, you just were.

Until this unique day when you were walking down the street and some shady guy, cloaked in a black hooded robe came upon your path.

"The key to happiness is in front of thee!", he yelled. You started to wonder if this was just some old man who was about to open his robe to flash his dick to you.

"No, young lad, i ain't opening my robes to show you my undergarments, and, no, i am not just a crazy old man".

You were amazed at this words, because you never said those thing, they just stayed where the were conceived: in your mind.

"Wh-what? How did you do that?!" You sputtered at the man.

At that moment, it seemed like the man just gave up on all the mysterious and mistique act he was pulling.

"*sigh*, you don't really get it, do ya' boy? I'm a wizard, a mage, a sorcerer! And i'm here to give you what you most want! You know, I've been watching you, and I know that you kinda like them small ladies.", he said.

You were amazed, this guy reads your mind and then he knows about your shrunken woman fetish?

"Ye-yeah, I like a girl when she is shorter than me, so what?", you tried to play it off.

"Oh, no, boy, I know that you like them reaaaaaally short, maybe smaller than your toes!"

Red-faced, you answered: "Well....yeah, but there is no way that you can make a woman shrink, it's just not possible!"

"Kid, you just watched a man read your mind, do you really think it's not possible?"

"Maybe it's just a trick you're pulling, maybe everyone you talk to says that, you just assume that's what they're going to think. "

With a loud sigh, the man pointed a finger at you. "Look, I didn't want to do this, but you leave me no choice". And, with that, he made a little swish downwards with his finger. The effect was almost instantaneous, just like that, no process of shrinking, no preparation for it, suddenly you were one inch tall, looking at this man's huge toes at face-level. You were awe-struck, it wasn't just the shock that you were smaller than an old bearded man's toes, but that shrinking, and more importantly, your biggest, wildest fetish, was possible.

Suddenly, awakening you from your stupor, a loud, banging, deep voice came from above:
"Now, you believe me?", that's when the awful reality struck you, YOU were shrunk, and at the mercy of an old man that you were just arguing.

"YES, I BELIEVE YOU! I'M SORRY!"

You saw the humongous man sigh with exasperation before he said: "Why do I even try, I just can't hear you", he chuckled a little and then he started to bend to the ground with his gigantic hand aiming for your tiny body. He grabbed you with his enormous hard, dry hand and brought you up to his billboard-sized face. Every little bump, every little scar on his face, you could see, it was amazing.

"SORRY!", you screamed, "I'M SORRY I DIDN'T BELIEVE YOU! PLEASE TURN ME BACK TO NORMAL!"

The man chuckled a little at this words, and then he spoke: "I shouldn't forgive you, not even think in bringing you back to normal, but it's normal, do not worry". Every word he spoke brought an almost unbearably hot wind from his mouth, took you a great strength to avoid slipping from his hand. After talking, he lowered you slowly to the ground, and, with an equally small flick from his hand, you regained your size.

"Now, kid, I like you, bigger men have become my personal plaything by being slightly rude. But you seem a good kid, and, because of that, i'm gonna share some of my power with you. You will be able to control the matter: Shrink, grow teleport matter. I won't even look at you, our paths shall never cross again, so use your power as you like, I can see that growing or shrinking yourself isn't your cup of tea, or even growing women, for that matter, so, I hope you will use my power to your own will." He gave you a wink. "Ok, so i'll be taking my leave. Have a happy life!"

And, before you could say anything, a loud poof was heard and he was gone.

Was it real? Could you really shrink matter at your own will?

You decided to try it out, you ran home and turned on the TV, since you could also teleport matter, that meant you could teleport a girl from wherever she was to your house already pocket-sized!

When you turned on the TV, there was a __________ concert on, you thought about it whit all your might and then, there she was, two inches tall and ready to be played with.

This was the start of a nice life.
